Pattern.name: State
Pattern.Desc: Allow an object to alter its behavior when its internal state changes. The object will appear to change its class.

Node.name: Context
Node.Desc: Defines the interface of interest to clients.\nMaintains an instance of a ConcreateState subclass that defines the current state.

Node.name: State
Node.Desc: Defines an interface for encapsulating the behavior associated with a particular state of the Context.

Node.name: ConcreteStateA
Node.Desc: Subclass that implements a specific behaviour associated with a state of the Context
